# SEQ06 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 6 focuses on character of local environments

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl021, apl022, apl023, apl024, apl025, apl026, apl027

## Emergent Phenomena
Local environments that support human life and activity at the pedestrian scale

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
